document.full_text: lebron james bristled monday at the idea his offensive prowess in the nba finals has been a disappointment and that his unwillingness to take charge down the stretch could ultimately affect his legacy.
document.title: lebron says winning will take care of his legacy
lines_and_colors: lebron james bristled monday at the idea his offensive prowess in the nba finals has been a disappointment and that his unwillingness to take charge down the stretch could ultimately affect his legacy.
